title: (x) Condensed serif headline in old newspaper - Cheltenham Extra Condensed {Jim}
content:
Merry Christmas Everybody!

I'm hoping the hive mind can help me find the closest font match to this:

[http://www.johndecker.net/CRW\_7668.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202075405/http:/www.johndecker.net/CRW_7668.jpg "http://www.johndecker.net/CRW\_7668.jpg")

Its from a newspaper in the Chicago area, around 1945.

-John

I have found some of the "headline" fonts, but nothing with matching serifs and similar lineweight.
author: jontom

comments.content: Wow, that was fast Jim. I think you are right!
